analysis.description:
StandardToken.recoverLost (/unique_chucks/48/0x08e16fe24d82c863066232e46ead45a07900475a.sol#414-422) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-this.transfer(lost,amount) (/unique_chucks/48/0x08e16fe24d82c863066232e46ead45a07900475a.sol#420-422)

BasicToken.constructor.totalSupply (local variable @ /unique_chucks/48/0x08e16fe24d82c863066232e46ead45a07900475a.sol#222) shadows:

	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (function @ /unique_chucks/48/0x08e16fe24d82c863066232e46ead45a07900475a.sol#181-182)
